title: Unknown modern sans
content:
Hi

I was hoping that someone could help me identify a font, that I would like to purchase.

Name, foundry og perhaps designer?

[http://www.anderskammersgaard.net/temp/font2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014539/http:/www.anderskammersgaard.net/temp/font2.jpg "http://www.anderskammersgaard.net/temp/font2.jpg")

Thanks!  
Phileas

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014539/http:/typophile.com/files/font_46.jpg) | 30.38 KB |

 [‹ (Mighty Morphin) Power Rangers Logo Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27495 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) KAM Designs rough script sans - Papyrus {Thierry Blancpain} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27516 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Phileas

comments.content:
It has a superficial similarity to Emigré’s Cholla Sans, but that’s not it.

- Mike Yanega

I think it’s [FTF Morgan Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014539/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=16) from Feliciano Type Foundry.

- Mike Yanega
Hah! Beat me to it whilst I was typing and linking! :^D

Type first, link later — that’s what you taught me Yves! You’re right, it’s the condensed.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks.... sure was fast!

Regards  
Phileas
